numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a larger proportion of people-of-color among players than among coaches.
2. I wonder why there are more people-of-color among players than among coaches.
3. I wonder if these statistics will change in the future.
4. I wonder why the statistics do not include FIFA.
5. I wonder why the statistics do not include the National Hockey League.
6. I think that FIFA would be a good addition to the statistics.
7. I think that the National Hockey League would be a good addition to the statistics.
8. I think that these leagues could contrast the included data.
9. I think that these leagues could reinforce the included data.
13. My community is impacted by current racial issues.
14. Societal discrimination is a current racial issue.
15. I think that societal discrimination could cause these statistics.
16. A person-of-color may be discriminated against when the person-of-color tries to get a higher-positioned job in sports.
17. A coaching job is a higher-positioned job in sports.
18. The graph shows a contrast between the percentage of people-of-color among coaches and the percentage of people-of-color among players.
19. The headline is: Why are people-of-color not getting an equal amount of play on both sides of the game?
